Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Garcia Laurent Fournier on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 37 years, Garcia Laurent Fournier has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Garcia Laurent Fournier is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Garcia graduated from Lycée Paul Valéry in 1983.
Garcia completed his university education at University of Montpellier in 1987.
Occupation History:
Garcia Laurent Fournier is a 61 year old and comes from France.
At Musée Rodin, Garcia Laurent Fournier held the position of Art Dealer from 1988 to 1992, developing essential skills in the field.
His subsequent role was as a Gallery Owner at Musée Rodin, where he continued to grow professionally from 1994 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 540000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3760000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
